name: TURN THE LIGHT OFF (DARKKDEITY)
description:
---

"Vess, a creature of the void, woke up one day to realize that light had started to spread into their land.

Quickly, they went to go find the source, to hopefully stop the spread of the light..."

---

TURN THE LIGHT OFF is a short 2D Platformer where you traverse through the void as a small void creature named Vess. They soon find that the other void creatures  that live there had been corrupted by the light, a malignant force in the void. Your job is to guide Vess through these lands to destroy the light source that is causing the corruption. Good luck!

---

CONTROLS

  • WASD to move (W to jump and to traverse through doors).
  • Jump on enemies to kill them.
  • Press SPACE to continue through screens.
  • Press ESC to exit the game.

---

OTHER

This game was made in a single semester in my Intro to Game Design class. If I ever plan to add more onto this game, I will update it. We'll see what happens.

All music and SFX are from Freesound.org!

Any feedback is welcome!

- DARKKDEITY
